document.full_text: al qaeda leader osama bin laden tried to hide behind women as u.s. special forces attacked his compound in pakistan monday and one died being used as a human shield, the white house said.
document.title: bin laden hid behind women in firefight: white house
lines_and_colors: al qaeda leader osama bin laden tried to hide behind women as u.s. special forces attacked his compound in pakistan monday and one died being used as a human shield, the white house said.
